title: Start
body: <> {{narrator}}Cray Island is a small oceanside town off the coast of New York. You, Jennifer, have come to this town to visit your brother, Jay, who moved here 5 years ago. Geez! That ferry ride made my stomach churn inside. I never understood why Jay moved here, but this place is still as stunning as last time! Jay and I were pretty different... I preferred the city while he wanted to settle down somewhere and build his own beach house. A week ago, Jay called and invited me to visit him here in Cray Island, saying he had something to show me. Now, let's see. Where is he...we were supposed to meet here. Maybe he's at the center? [[Call Jay|dial_Jay]] [[Look for Jay at the Town Center|center_jay]]

title: center_jay
body: <> I looked for Jay at his favorite cafe in town, but couldn't find him. Hmmm...Maybe I should call him? [[Call Jay|dial_Jay]]

title: dial_Jay
body:
<<place dialjay>>
...
Hmm...He's not picking up...let me try again
[[Call again|call_Jay]]

title: call_Jay
body: <> {{narrator}}Phone picks up Jay? Are you still meeting me at the beach? {{narrator}}--No answer-- Hello?? {{narrator}}You hear something crash and the call ends. That's strange...I guess I'll have to meet him at his place [[Go to Jay's house|arrive_at_house]]

title: arrive_at_house
body: <> {{narrator}}You ring the door, but no one answers. Hmm...No one is answering. {{narrator}}You take a look at the door and notice that it is slightly opened. {{jennifer}}This is weird. {{narrator}}You open the door and slowly make your way inside hesitantly. <> Jay?? Are you home? {{narrator}}You stop in your tracks and look at the floor in front of you. {{narrator}}There are papers spread out everywhere. Slowly, I looked at the sight in front of me...and there in the kitchen... Jay laid lifeless on the ground with a paper in his hand... Jay? Jay?? No, this can't be! [[Call the cops.|cops_come]]

title: cops_come
body:
<<place house>>
{{narrator}}~Few hours later~
{{cop}}Miss, we finished searching the house. There doesn't seem to be anything strange lying around.
Are you sure? There must be something!
{{cop}}Sorry, miss. All that was left was this note inside his pocket.
{{narrator}}The cop hands you the note.
[[Read the note|read_note]]

title: read_note
body:
<<place note>>
No. This can't be. Jay wouldn't leave like this. He wouldn't kill himself.
<<place House>>
{{cop}}I'm sorry miss, but it looks like he strangled himself and there is not much showing that he was murdered. Good day.
{{narrator}}The cop leaves while you stay still outside the house.
{{narrator}}You look at the packet the cop has left in your hands. Inside was the piece of paper Jay was holding when you found him.
[[Check the paper that was in his hand.|check_paper]]
[[Walk around inside for clues|look_clues]]

title: check_paper
body: <> {{narrator}}You look at the paper and see that it's a blueprint of the beach house Jay wanted to build. <> {{narrator}}~Flashback to a younger Jay's conversation~ {{jay}}When I grow older, I want to build my own beach house! Jen, we can play in it together! Tears ran down my face as I recalled this memory. <> [[Walk around the house for clues|look_clues]]

title: look_clues
body: <> Who did this to you? {{narrator}}You look around the house, searching for clues when suddenly you hear a sound coming from the backyard. <> I took a look outside and found a ripped, yellow scarf. The same one I got for Jay's girlfriend, Sarah. No way...[[Call Sarah|call_sarah]]

title: call_sarah
body:
<<place callsarah>>
{{sarah, happy}}Hi, what's up! Did you get to the island safely? I heard from Jay that you were coming.
Sarah...Why?
{{sarah}}Huh? Are you crying? Is something wrong?
[[Did you do it? Did you kill him?|ask_sarah]]

title: examine_house
body: <> {{narrator}}You walk around the kitchen and notice something under the counter. Why would his keys be here? [[Examine the keys|examine_key]]

title: examine_key
body: <> {{narrator}}The key has an engraving that says WILSONS {{narrator}}They key also has a handwritten engraving that says:Luke's Isn't this Luke's grocery store? Strange.... [[Go to Wilson's|go_wilson]]

title: ask_sarah
body: {{sarah, upset}} I really don't understand. Are you okay? Where are you? JAY! Jay is dead, Sarah. And I found the scarf I bought you here. {{narrator}}-silence- {{sarah, upset}} Stop playing around..April Fools was two months ago. I'm not joking. I found him dead today. Apparently strangled. {{sarah,shocked}}Jay's dead? That can't be. He called me yesterday, how can he be dead! Stop putting on an act! I know you did it. There's marks all over the scarf. {{sarah, mad}}I would never! You know how much I love him! {{sarah, upset}}We were even planning on building his beach house together! You're lying! He left a note saying that you guys broke up. Just leave him alone if you guys broke up! Why would you kill him! {{sarah, mad}} What are you saying...We never broke up. What? His note says that you left him because he was broke. {{sarah, upset}}I don't know what note you are talking about, but I would never leave him for such a shitty reason. Then, why did I find your scarf laying around? It seems ripped as well. {{sarah, mad}} What? If you're talking about my yellow scarf, I gave that to Luke last week. {{sarah}} He wanted to borrow more money to gamble. {{sarah}} I had to give it to him because he wouldn't stop pressuring Jay to give him money. {{jenn}} Luke gambles? {{sarah}}Yeah...It's hard for Jay to say no. {{sarah}}For the past couple of years, Jay's been lending him money. {{sarah}} Although, Jay told me yesterday that he firmly told Luke he won't give him any more money. {{jenn}} This is strange. I need to call Luke. [[{{jenn}}Call Luke|call_luke]]

title: call_luke
body: <> {{Luke, happy}}Hello? Jen? Hey Luke! How are you? {{Luke}} The usual - just watching over the store. Oh...Is it busy? {{luke}}Yeah, pretty busy! I'll have to call you back later. I see... {{narrator}}Call ends [[Look around the house for clues.|examine_house]]

title: go_wilson
body:
<<place town>>
The store's closed...with no annoucement on the door either.
[[Go back to Jay's house|back_house]]

title: back_house
body: <> {{narrator}}You take a look again at Jay's suicide note. <> Now that I look at it again...This isn't Jay's handwriting. This handwriting looks familiar though... I looked at the handwriting on the tag from Luke's keys and place it next to the note. <> The handwriting is the same! Interesting... <> Decide your final choice. [[{{jennifer}}Choose Luke as the suspect and call police.|inform_police]] [[{{jennifer}}Consider it a suicide|dead_end]]

title: dead_end
body:
<<place screen>>
You lost! The one who killed Jay was Luke!!
[[End game|end]]

title: inform_police
body:
<<place police>>
Hello? I'd like to submit evidence for a suspected murder and suspect..
[[Give the police the evidence|end]]
[[Change mind...It's a suicide|dead_end]]
